welcomeMessage:
Welcome
Hi, I'm Gaurav Halnawar, a DevOps Engineer.
Welcome to my interactive portfolio terminal!
Type 'help' to see available commands.

help.output:
Available commands:
about           - Learn about me
projects        - View my projects
skills          - See my technical skills
experience      - My work experience
contact         - How to reach me
education       - My educational background
certifications  - View my certifications
clear           - Clear the terminal
sudo            - Show my intro
quote           - Get a motivational quote
mission         - Show my career mission
ascii           - Show ASCII logo

about.output:
I'm Gaurav Halnawar, a passionate DevOps Engineer.
BCA graduate with hands-on experience in DevOps tools like Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines. Skilled in Linux administration, version control (Git), and scripting (Bash, Python). I thrive in cloud-native environments and aim to deliver secure, scalable, and automated solutions.

projects.output: 1. Future Study Hub - Advanced E-Learning Platform for academic and career planning. - Designed for scalability and high user traffic. - Technologies: PHP, JavaScript, Ajax, Bootstrap, MySQL, HTML, CSS. - Live: futurestudyhub.10001mb.com - GitHub: github.com/Manthan-Gaurav/Future-Study-Hub-main 2. RFID-Based Campus Security System - RFID-based student identification with facial recognition (DeepFace). - Real-time verification and secure access. - Technologies: React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Docker, RFID Reader. - GitHub: github.com/Manthan-Gaurav/RFID---AI-Based-Student-Identification

skills.output:
Programming: PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python
Frameworks: React.js, Node.js, Bootstrap, Kubernetes
DevOps Tools: Docker, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS, GCP
Monitoring: New Relic, CloudWatch
Scripting: Bash, Python
Version Control: Git, GitHub, Bitbucket
Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
Soft Skills: Leadership, Problem Solving, Time Management, Teamwork, Willingness to Learn

experience.output:
Intern DevOps Engineer - Nexasoft Infotech, Surat (May 2024 – July 2024)
- Linux system administration, Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration.
- Implemented CI/CD workflows and deployment automation.
- Hands-on with AWS services and cloud infrastructure setup.

education.output: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) - Uka Tarsadia University, Bardoli (2022–2025)

sudo.output:
✨ Access granted ✨
Hi, I'm Gaurav Halnawar, a DevOps Engineer.

quote.output: "Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success." – Albert Schweitzer

mission.output: To design and implement secure, scalable, and automated cloud solutions that enable teams to deliver faster and with confidence.
